title: Failed log in (2+ days)
body: Over the past couple days, I have tried to log in and keep getting the error "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again." I have tried everything from using the Hextech repair tool to repatch and reinstall, uninstalling and reinstalling myself, changing my password, running as administrator, changing my wifi, updating my computer, troubleshooting the application and contacting a Riot Support member. However I am still unable to login and it is pretty frustrating. So I was wondering if maybe there is some way to fix this problem. Thanks

replies.body:
Do me a favor and try updating your port forward and DNS network settings specifically. If you aren't sure how to change those in the best way for League, check out those steps in the [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) FAQ for help. 

Those two steps can get you a clearer signal to the servers that League uses, but if that doesn't help, try using a VPN and let me know if that helps or not.
I tried all three but nothing seemed to work. I still cannot log in.

Hmmmm there must be something else blocking your network from being able to get through since there don't seem to be any widespread issues atm. Reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your network logs so they can see if there's anything specific getting in the way.
